channel.title: SikuliX on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in SikuliX on Memo Tut

item.title: What automation should I do in RPA, VBA, or programming languages?
item.description: It is called business automation, but there are many tools for automation. You mean, "You don't have to use that special tool for that task!?" So, I tried to categorize by business type, environment, user type, etc. 1. Automation of core operations (accounting, HR, CRM, ERP, etc.) RPA recommendation level: ☆☆☆☆☆ Don’t hesitate to introduce packaged software for human resources, salary, management accounting, supply chain, cost accounting, CRM, etc. for basic business as a company independent of the industry and automation of business unique to the industry.
